data.text: @EE Been with your Broadband for 6 years mobile phone contract 12 years. I can't use your services anymore as the place I'm moving to already has EE broadband and you want to charge me ¬£164 to cancel. I am furious with this level of service for a exemplary customer of yours.
@EE Imagine putting your prices up 13% in april ü§°
@EE I manually moved my roaming from AT&T to TMobile and everything worked ok.
@tgou32 @Jamespepper55 @officialEIHL @EE Think people expect him to go sit in a corner somewhere n have a timeout n he's not allowed back til he apologises n means it!
@nelson207 @Jamespepper55 @officialEIHL Shambles that @EE didn't ban his services.  Got a sideline ban should mean he shouldn't have access to his phone!!!!  I'm offended
@EE Yeah until they put you on a high tariff for a new phone. Moving.
@ee any information about lack of signal in HR6 0 ? When will service be back?
@EE Unhappy Friday. No service in NR21 since 09.30 this morning and still no service now ‚Ä¶.
@Sim0nTrains 3G on some networks is very reliable now, barely anyone uses it so isn‚Äôt as congested as 4g is. Saying that I am on @EE
@EE Hey guys. Little to no data signal today at my home in SE London. Is affecting my 5g phone data and 4G broadband (no fibre in the area yet)... any updates?
@EE Hi is is possible to speak to a person? I can‚Äôt get onto the shop, needing a SIM only with Apple Watch connectivity?
@EE Hi @EE seems to be little to no 5G or 4G signal in SE London. Affecting my phone and 4G broadband box as well
@EE I‚Äôm texting GO FASTER to 150, but I keep getting an error come back as a text.
@ChrissyCostanza I would have said Vodaphone is the worst but guess all networks have their weak areas. @EE or someone should hook you up!
@EE hi- can I use an EE perk nhs discount code on an add on data offer? Thank you

@EE please help, I‚Äôm a new customer who has had the WORST experience in the last week. I‚Äôve spoken to 5 advisors each one has told me something contradictory and now I‚Äôve been on the phone for 30 mins only to be told there are no supervisors available üòÇ. Is this a joke?

Hey @EE @MarcAllera let today be great: start showing support & enact a policy for customers affected by domestic abuse #CorporateAccountability #CorporateResponsibility #DoSomething #victimblaming #SurvivorShaming #MeToo¬†#CoerciveControl #FinancialAbuse #DomesticAbuse #Day1040
@EE need help trying to upgrade online but page keeps crashing. Also keep getting disconnected over the phone

@virginmedia Another night of crap gaming cheers! Soon going to @bt full fibre broadband as long as its the same price, but better performance I hope, P.S. @virginmedia you are a joke and weather  @EE or @Bt is good or bad you are history.
Imagine buying a ¬£10 Roaming add on and not being able to call people the whole time you‚Äôre abroadüòä @EE

@EE hi, I got a text that I can't claim Prime anymore as my smart benefit? But it was an option when I signed up to my contract, does that mean you won't honour the original benefit and I need to pick something else I don't really want?
@EE Can it do this? https://t.co/k798R9VOgg

Paper spam from @ee, saying if we pay ¬£10 more then we pay now (base rate) we can have shittier vdsl from @Bt_uk. No /29 routed IP, no multi line support as we'd have to use their useless router, no VPN support... Not much of an offer.

@EE I‚Äôve been in to customer services 3 times today as my stepdaughter can‚Äôt use her phone over in Ireland, I‚Äôve been told there‚Äôs no issues on the account but she‚Äôs still unable to make or receive calls? Please can you help

@EE I'm getting really pissed off here. I get a smart watch and your whole system is fucking shit. I was told by your tech that he gets 5 calls a day about them. It's not acceptable and I'm still within the grace period so I'm likely to tell you to go fuck yourselves at this rate.
@VOXI_UK switching from @EE to you guys

@EE I am trying to return a product but the post office cannot scan the barcode to process, can someone please advise me on what I'm supposed to do as your instructions are very basic, and the post office has no clue either.
@racingfront @MogP @EE @BBCNews Reckon he hit the wrong tweet at a guess ü§£
@champtgram @BigBrainKids @yooni66666 @CodyOrlove @DeltaWGMI @suraj_raushan @EE  discord: Ao1Sor4#3401   0xc7f59A75Eb456BADF208C9D96720f8a687DAfc05

@EE I‚Äôve no difficulties paying you at all, but you‚Äôre greedy bastards! Increasing that much is a joke, I‚Äôve just paid up my contract early for the remaining 14 months and ordered a new contract elsewhere for a fraction of the cost, especially with you removing my data roaming add on
@EE https://t.co/ZHkJacoXZw
@EE I'll admit it's rather frustrating that the majority of help online seems to focus on the Router-PC section, when it's clear that the router itself has access to a slower connection than normal.
@EE Does this only work if my landline is also with EE? I'm fairly sure ours isn't.
@YesCompSols @EE Yeah, seems to be standard practice now for the big companies, but the hike seems quite drastic. Inflation + 3.9% seems a bit cheeky really.
@EE yet again nothing working without WiFi.... When are the works going to stop in my area?? Been going on for 4 days now.... Had this at the beginning of the month as well

@imdsm @EE The price rises are literally declared in the contract and were verbally explained to me when I re contracted. So it didn't come as a surprise to me. Not many places left without price rises baked into contract now?
@EE hey, I‚Äôve currently got a data add on while abroad in turkey of 500mb a day, will I get a warning if this amount is reached or will just get extra charges? Thanks
@EE Cant get ee in my house in city but they can 5g  on top of a mountain... yeah ok...
@EE still no calls form your escalations team a week on after being misold the wrong product .... Please send me a letter of deadlock so I can get this sorted
@EE I have a landline, yes. But I'm not home right now so can't access it.
As if @EE just told me they‚Äôre raising prices by 9.3%‚Ä¶ 9.3%! What use is a contract if there are price changes every March?

@EE Sadly nothing I've done seems to have brought back my previous download speed.

As I said, this happened after a several-hour-long outage, first time it fixed itself, but after the second the bandwidth has remained at ~7.5Mbps instead of the usual 14.
@EE 2 weeks of not being able to top up is becoming ridiculous, no EE pages will load on any device on any network. I cant even call my damn therapist. Is there a reason for this or?

@EE is there a reason as to why not a single ee page will load for me to top my phone up? My home WiFi is fine but no page will load, not even ee home page. Can we sort this please? 2 weeks and I still can't sort it.
@EE My price contract is going up supposed to be a fixed term contract yes ok NOT
@EE So not really great value but thanks for replying
@EE My billing date is the 7th so if I do it now I only get 20 days üò≥
@EE I can block them, but I'd rather they not happen at all if it can be prevented. https://t.co/NC6G1oGbkq
@ABeautifulCult1 @EE They seem to be using them on every other mobile advert, is being in 99.99% of ads making you feel marginalised snowflake ‚ùÑÔ∏è ?
@EE No need, in on the mobile network as we speak, all fine
@EE Yes, I had to go onto the EE website and manually pay. It's working now, hopefully it will go through automatically next month like usual.  Thanks
@EE Hi, the network is fine, it was an issue with my card payment.  I presume it's due to the increased checks brought in by banks.
@EE if I take out your unlimited data add on on a monthly basis does it renew after a month or on my billing date?

One thing that irritates my OCD when it comes to the @EE ad featuring the family with the ATC in their living room and that‚Äôs when they get handed to tablet so that Kev  can congratulate them and it‚Äôs in portrait and not landscape üôÅ
@EE I‚Äôve sorted it thank you
@MarcAllera @BTAAwards @EE @bt_uk Congrats
@EE every time I try text through Siri it fails to send, even though I have signal?

Awesome to celebrate our industry‚Äôs Black role models and trailblazers at last night‚Äôs @BTAAwards w/ our Ethnic Diversity Network.

Honoured to be named Ally of the Year, but all credit to my colleagues for making @EE and @bt_uk a team that welcomes all where you can be yourself. https://t.co/iUNwQxGpHm
@SimonBeale @EE @Mobilescouk @AffordableMob Can can confirm affordable mobiles only do them with Three, Vodafone and O2
@SimonBeale @EE @Mobilescouk @AffordableMob Mobiles UK only have one with Vodafone currently
@EE Same number. I was an EE PAYG customer 2008-2011, then ported my number to O2, and ported it back a few weeks ago.
@EE hi, I bought the data add on for ¬£8.35 per month?? Why am I now being charged ¬£20 on my bill???? https://t.co/v2W41uxl8r
@EE Ok thanks.
Hi @EE . Can I someone to call me please as one of my devices is in Ireland not working.  Thanks.
@EE Amazed that after at least 2 weeks your app / website still won‚Äôt allow log-on https://t.co/Q062PXPJbV
@EE Thank you very much! Have a good weekend!
@EE It's all the spam HMRC calls. All from 07531 prefix numbers,  so I answer it thinking it's someone's mobile.
Is the @EE network down in East Hampshire?
@EE My prepaid SIM is having an auth error when trying to connect to the EE WiFi-Auto SSID in the underground. Have to activate in the store before use?
@Insy812 @EE @Etsy Must ask others how they find service locally
@EE That‚Äôs a laugh, cause most customers are still waiting for there s22 üòÇüòÇ me included üò¨
@EE Yeah I know it‚Äôs just annoying having these texts and even more seeing people and hearing that there‚Äôs have now been delivered

#LongLiveYourTech 
@EE 's Great Grandfather https://t.co/IzbMDp3WPP https://t.co/nEI0wAB351

@EE Yeah all good now thank you, went into the Southend branch to ask the question. Apparently my antenna broke, but luckily was due an upgrade anyway so they gave me a new phone which is only ¬£3 more per month from a iPhone 11 to 13. Thank you, appreciate it!!
@EE dreadful service. Made be pay ¬£10 and still can't send WhatsApp or messenger
@EE ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
@EE No thank you. Don't trust the process no more. Already gone through the complaints section and now I have to go to The Ombudsmen Service.
Fuck @EE by being allowed to put your contract up ¬£11 a month not long after you sign it. Absolute piss take, don‚Äôt care if you landed a plane from some whoppers living room on your Wi-Fi üò°

Well I won't be bothering with getting anything else from @EE.

Walk out of a shop with a new phone and figured I'd give a watch a go... wish I hadn't bothered... more hassle than it's worth... who wants to pay to put this much work in for it. Shit process. Shit service. Cba man.
@EE Won‚Äôt be the last one either
@EE I can see the update it's still not here or dispatched I doubt you can tell me any different than yesterday.

@EE Good afternoon, I hope you're well? I was just wondering if it is possible to do a trade-in deal and use my student discount on the same package as well? I am looking at the new S22+ and have a S20 to trade in but wanted to check before placing an order
@DrHoenderkamp @BorisJohnson @RishiSunak @EE have increased my phone bill by nearly 10% as well. Seriously considering emigrating
My @EE broadband is so useless I have to use 4g to do my @Etsy listings

Total nightmare with EE. Tried to upgrade and have had nothing but one f**k up after another and when I have contacted them to sort it I got absolutely no help what so ever. Think it might be time to go with another network which is a shame after being with EE for years @EE
@EE Hi. My SIM only is now out of contract and I wish to close the account. How do I do this? Thanks
Definitely not upgrading with @EE with their prices üëÄüëÄ

@EE Thanks Rachel, will sort it out after work once we get the text.
Appreciate you getting back to be. Lynn
@EE Hello, just spoke to two excellent humans. Worth navigating the hideous automated answer service to get to them, please make it easier üôè
@EE Why the hell my wifi so slow? Literally trying to download a Unity package, and it's downloading at 1,5 KB/s -.- I am literally using the 5GhZ -.-
@EE Ok will do thanks.
@EE Another day another no S22 ultra at my door.

@EE Hi just a quick question I have an old iPhone 10 that I got through you and have since got the iPhone 12. If I wanted to unblock the old iPhone to be able to use on other networks is that something you can do?

@EE you have texted me 4 times now! Telling me to pair my Samsung watch, problem there is, I haven‚Äôt received my s22 yet as I‚Äôm still waiting! So any chance you could just get it delivered or just stop rubbing it in that I can‚Äôt use my watch yet üò§
@EE I switched my phone back to EE 3 weeks ago. Now I'm getting nonstop spam calls from other EE numbers. Can you do anything about this?

@EE how wonderful EE is, taken money from my account, no phone arrived, called just sent around in circles, not being able to talk to anyone. There is another account due for renewal the way you have treated us, lied to us, there is fat chance of that rather use more code.

@EE hello! What is the current wait time for the S22. I ordered Wednesday 16th and I have until 31st March to send off my old phone for trade in. Is it going to be cutting it fine to meet that deadline?

@EE @EEHelpdesk I do not understand why one of your managers won't tell me the address they've sent a parcel to. I'm absolutely fuming about this and all my concerns are feeling ignored. It's all feeling so incredibly unprofessional and suspicious https://t.co/fozaSNwV0k

@majormagna Ah yeah it will need to be linked to the same account as your actual broadband I believe. -Bob

@majormagna Oh no worries, if you know the number, you can text FAULT followed by the landline number to 60071 and this will run some checks on the line and in the local area to see if there's anything going on there. Do you want to see what comes back from that? -Bob

@imdsm @EE The price rises are literally declared in the contract and were verbally explained to me when I re contracted. So it didn't come as a surprise to me. Not many places left without price rises baked into contract now?
As if @EE just told me they‚Äôre raising prices by 9.3%‚Ä¶ 9.3%! What use is a contract if there are price changes every March?
Who would put their neck on the line to prove the power of a network? Brave and beautiful Tom Ellis, of course! Featuring a London Barber and Robot Arm. You just can‚Äôt make this up.

@majormagna Hey there, I hope you're well with the exception of the broadband issues. I know slow speeds can be the cause of massive frustration. Do you have a landline associated with the broadband account on your bill at all? (Please don't confirm the number if you do) -Bob
@majormagna Great. Keep me posted with how you get on. -Michael D
@andhealey That would be correct, yeah. You'd still have access to the full unlimited data during that time though üòä -Craig

@annaonthemoon Hmm that's really odd then, I would definitely recommend forwarding the details to the number I mentioned. Depending on the phone you're using, you might also be able to block the numbers too so it'll also be worth looking to do that. What type of phone is it you have? -Bob
@EE Do white people still use phones?
@gredawarha Ah that's great and I can make sure all is ok at our side if you would like? -Mark
@gredawarha Ah right. has everything went through ok now? -Mark
@gredawarha Hi Darren, I can help see how things are in the area. Please pop me a DM with your full postcode -Mark https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0

@batqueenTW If you decide to keep the pass going forward, you'll just see the one ¬£10 charge on your bill each month which will cover it for the month ahead. If you ever want to remove it, just text STOP UNLIMITED to 150. It's best to do that before your bill date too üòä (3/3) -Craig

@SimonBeale @EE @Mobilescouk @AffordableMob Mobiles UK only have one with Vodafone currently
@annaonthemoon Did you keep hold of your existing number when you moved back to us or did you start fresh with a new number? -Bob

@annaonthemoon Ahh okay, so it sounds like someone spoofing a number by the sounds of things there. If you do get calls like that, it's a good idea to text CALL to 7726 they will text you back asking for the number that the call came from which helps to tackle these scam calls. -Bob

@HorseRacing779 Ah great stuff and the new iPhone 13's are lovely aren't they. That's not bad either just ¬£3 a month more :). Enjoy the weekend If we can help with anything else at all just give us a shout :) -Mark

@annaonthemoon Hey Rebecca, I hope you're well. 

I know getting a load of unwanted calls can be a real pain. Have you answered any of the calls to see if there is anyone on the other end? -Bob

And we‚Äôve partnered with Samsung to help customers with hearing impairments get the most out of EE and the new Samsung S22 range, too.

When our in-store QR code is scanned, it links to videos about the new Samsung series with sign language interpreter Simon, and closed captions. https://t.co/xggCSlaJJV

@Michael57690152 Hi Michael, 

I'm sorry to hear that you're still waiting to receive your new phone. I know that you'll want to get this as soon as possible to start using it and the watch. As soon as the phone is available, it will be dispatched and on it's way to you. -Russ

@Punkdude1981 Ah right, I am pleased you have that to check. Sorry, you are right, I will not have any further information than that. We will get it to you as quickly as we can. - Sarahjane
